verses.name: Acts 16:18
verses.text: And this did she many days. But Paul, being grieved, turned and said to the spirit, I command thee in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her. And he came out the same hour.

verses.name: Acts 16:19
verses.text: And when her masters saw that the hope of their gains was gone, they caught Paul and Silas, and drew them into the marketplace unto the rulers,

verses.name: Acts 16:20
verses.text: And brought them to the magistrates, saying, These men, being Jews, do exceedingly trouble our city,

verses.name: Acts 16:21
verses.text: And teach customs, which are not lawful for us to receive, neither to observe, being Romans.
